content.title: Billing Method
content.text: Select whether the shipper, consignee, or a third-party pays for the shipment.

content.title: Pickup
content.text: The time and date you would like your shipment to be picked up at.

content.title: Reference Number
content.text: The shipper’s reference number is an identifier for your shipment. This reference number could be a PO number, a sales order number, a customer’s job number, or anything to help you cross-reference this shipment.

content.title: Bill To
content.text: The information below specifies who the shipment will be billed to.

content.title: Pickup Information
content.text: Please specify any special instructions for pick-up in this section.

content.title: Delivery Information
content.text: Please specify any special instructions for delivery in this section.

content.title: Return
content.text: If you require a return, please specify the goods being returned. Click on Return to add a return row.

content.title: Type
content.text: Select the packaging type for this good.

content.title: Commodity
content.text: Select the type of goods being shipped.

content.title: Particulars
content.text: Usually general freight but indicate if any of these other conditions apply.

content.title: Weight
content.text: The weight for each package.

content.title: Metric
content.text: Ship with units of measure: cm, kg

content.title: Imperial
content.text: Ship with units of measure: in, lbs

content.title: Declared Value
content.text: Maximum liability of $2.00 per lb/$4.40 per kg unless declaration value states otherwise. Additional insurance is available for a cost of $3.00 per $100 of value.

content.title: Return Service
content.text: If you require a return, please select goods coming back in the GOODS SECTION.

content.title: Vehicle
content.text: In most cases, the vehicle is automatically selected. However, if you’re shipping an oversized item, please choose the appropriate vehicle.

content.title: P.O.D. Email
content.text: For proof of delivery confirmation, enter your email address here and a POD will be emailed to you.

content.title: GPS Email
content.text: For tracking updates, enter your email address and a link will be emailed to you where you can view real time where your shipment is in transit.

content.title: Delivery Appointment
content.text: If you require a delivery appoint, please specify here. Please note this is mandatory for Tender deliveries.

content.title: Email Notifications
content.text: Enter comma separated list of email addresses to receive notifications.
